Title: Night Draws Near.
Subtitle: Iraq's People in the Shadow of America's War.
Authors: Anthony Shadid.
Categories: History.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=foVhywPrz4EC&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: An Arab-American journalist looks at the Iraq War from the perspective of ordinary Iraqi citizens confronted by the dislocations, hardships, tragedies, and harsh realities of the conflict..
